### A Gallery of Some of My Favorite California Native Plants

All photos were taken by Hannah Garcia-Wickstrum. Please ask for permission before using. 

![Owls Clover (*Castilleja exserta*) at Carrizo Plain National Monument](plant_photos/owls_clover.jpeg)

![Butterfly Mariposa Lily (*Calochortus venustus*) at Mt. Pinos, Los Padres National Forest](plant_photos/c_venustus.jpeg)

![Desert Lily (*Hesperocallis undulata*) at Anza Borrego Desert State Park](plant_photos/lily_anza.png)

![Fire poppies (*Papaver californicum*) growing in the Santa Monica Mountains after the Woolsey Fire](plant_photos/fire_poppy.png)

![California Pitcher Plant (*Darlingtonia californica*), a carnivorous plant at Butterfly Valley Botanical Area in Plumas National Forest](plant_photos/darlingtonia.jpeg)
